admin.integrations_list_desc: Integreiddiwch gydag offer monitro lluosog i greu hysbysiadau cyfoethog a chyfunol i dorri trwy sŵn yr hysbysiad ar gyfer datrysiad cyflym.
admin.integrations_list_title: Crëwch Integreiddiadau gydag offer monitro i dderbyn eich holl hysbysiadau amser real mewn yn lleoliad.

alert_management.desc: Mae Freshservice yn gadael i chi integreiddio'n llyfn gyda nifer lluosog o offer monitro a brysbennu eich holl wybodaeth hysbysu mewn un lle. Yna mae’r hysbysiadau sy'n dod i mewn i gyd yn cael eu grwpio’n ddeallus i'ch helpu i dorri trwy’r sŵn a chyrraedd cnewyllyn y mater. Gallwch hefyd sefydlu rheolau hysbysiad i greu digwyddiadau ar gyfer gweithredu awtomatig ac i hysbysu eich tîm i ddechrau datrys ar unwaith.
alert_management.title: Ynghylch Rheoli Hysbysiad

alert_rules.desc: Mae Rheolau Hysbysiad yn gadael i chi ddynodi amodau yn seiliedig ar yr hysbysiadau sy'n dod i mewn i greu Digwyddiadau awtomatig, ac i'w dosbarthu a chyfathrebu i'r timau perthnasol yn brydlon. Mae hyn yn sicrhau na fyddwch yn cael eich llethu gan ddigwyddiadau lluosog ar gyfer yr un mater. Mae’r hysbysiadau sy'n cael eu creu yn Freshservice yn cael eu datrys yn awtomatig ar dderbyn hysbysiad gyda difrifoldeb Iawn o’r offeryn monitro.
alert_rules.title: Rheolau Hysbysiad

automated_grouping.desc: Reduce noise through automated grouping powered by Freddy machine learning algorithm. Freddy studies incoming alerts and attaches them to related open '{incidents}'. You can train freddy to make better correlations by manually attaching an alert to a related open '{incident}'. Similarly, you can detach a freddy-attached alert from an '{incident}' to let Freddy know that the correlation was erroneous. The more you use and train Freddy, the better it will become at reducing noise!
automated_grouping.title: Automated grouping

alert_grouping.desc: Mae Freshservice yn eich helpu i dorri trwy sŵn a sicrhau nad yw materion critigol yn llithro trwy'r bylchau. Mae hysbysiadau rhybudd mynych a anfonir ar gyfer yr un mater (Er enghraifft: hysbysiadau defnydd CPU lluosog yn cael eu hanfon gan weinydd) yn cael eu grwpio’n awtomatig fel un cofnod hysbysu wedi ei gyfoethogi yn Freshservice i arbed amser i chi yn prosesu pob hysbysiad.
alert_grouping.title: Grwpio hysbysiadau deallus a lleihau sŵn

integration.desc: Ffurfweddwch integreiddiadau gydag amrywiol offer monitro i frysbennu eich holl wybodaeth hysbysu mewn un panel. Gyda Freshservice, gallwch drosi'r hysbysiadau a anfonir o’r offer hyn i hysbysiadau strwythuredig, cyfoethog a hawdd eu deall waeth beth yw eu ffynhonnell a gwneud penderfyniadau effeithiol.
integration.title: Integreiddiwch eich offer monitro

info.text1: Here are a few important points to note when importing data into a custom object:
info.text2: Ensure your CSV has a header row with field names (eg: Item, Approver, Vendor Info ...etc)
info.text3: Ensure your CSV has a column dedicated to the system generated "Record ID" which is a unique reference to each record.
info.text4: Record ID will be used to match records in your custom object.
info.text5: If a matching ID is found, the record is updated.
info.text6: If this value is empty, then the record is inserted.
info.text7: If no matching ID is found, then the import is skipped for that record.

dkim.authentication: Set up SPF and DKIM email authentication
dkim.help_text: If you set up a verified helpdesk email that uses your organization's domain name and choose to send messages via Freshservice mail servers, that domain name will appear here for authentication. To set it up:
dkim.info1: Create CNAME records by clicking on 'Get Started'
dkim.info2: Copy and paste them in the appropriate fields in your domain provider's account
dkim.info3: Verify after returning to this page so that we can confirm if you have updated your records correctly
dkim.no_verified_email: There is no verified support email added that uses a custom domain name and sends messages via Freshservice mail servers.
dkim.question_info: The name/alias that will point to a freshservice domain
dkim.remove_desc: If your domain is verified, this will delete your private key and disable digital signing with your organization's domain. You can regenerate new records later.
dkim.remove_title: Are you sure you want to remove the records?
dkim.setup_guide: Need help? Refer to our setup guide

sidebar.info1: Why should you set this up?
sidebar.info10: A custom mail server. You need to set up SPF and DKIM authentication at your inbox service provider's end.
sidebar.info2: This is to help your emails reach the recipient's inbox safely. By setting this up here, you can:
sidebar.info3: Sign emails with your domain name instead of 'freshservice' thereby helping the recipient validate that you are the real sender of the message
sidebar.info4: Remove the 'via freshservice.com' path that may appear next to your emails
sidebar.info6: Who doesn't need to set this up here?
sidebar.info7: You don't need to set it up if you use:
sidebar.info8: A public domain email address like Gmail, Outlook, and Yahoo. Please choose the custom mail server option if you're facing delivery issues.
sidebar.info9: A freshservice subdomain such as @acme.freshservice.com as it's authenticated by default.
sidebar.spf_dkim_link: Step-by-step guide to set up SPF and DKIM

dkim.verification_unsuccessful: Verification was unsuccessful. Please ensure that these CNAME records are updated in your DNS settings as per the instructions in our setup guide. If you continue to face this issue, please reach out to your domain provider's support team to troubleshoot it.
